title: Convex lens - f for object 9 cm and image 18 cm

content.question: When an object is located <math alttext="9 centimeters" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>9</mn><mspace width="0.2em"></mspace><mi>cm</mi></math> from a convex lens, a real image is formed <math alttext="18 centimeters" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>18</mn><mspace width="0.2em"></mspace><mi>cm</mi></math> from the lens. What is the focal length of the lens?

skill.text: 2.B: Calculate or estimate an unknown quantity with units from known quantities, by selecting and following a logical computational pathway.
